input.sentences: put it on or around a mannequin or in a display case with a sign | and people will buy it .
some of these shoes are n't even wearable | yet because they are for sale they will be bought .
this nasty array of human hair will be sold and worn over another nasty array of ( still connected to a human ) hair .
at the end of all the shopping | the excess just goes into storage boxes .
output.sentences: If people see a sign that says "sale!" they will buy it right off the mannequin.
Even if the shoes are too ugly and unwearable, people will still buy them if they are on sale.
One time I saw some one buy an old pair of worn nasty underwear!
How do people even have the storage for all this excess junk?!
